products.title: Splash Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash dove grey panel blind in grey. Made to measure from 36.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their moisture-resistant splash dove grey panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The light grey panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product id: db-pan0272 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash cream panel blind in cream. Made to measure from 36.61 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash cream panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light cream fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. At swift direct blinds, like all their made to measure products, these panel blinds are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing. 
 
 Product id: db-pan0248 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Voile FR Sandshell Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Voile fr sandshell cream panel blind in cream. Made to measure from 39.38 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their voile fr fabrics look beautiful up due to their translucent properties in a wide array of neutral shades. 
 Durable and stylish, this translucent cream panel blind allows the light to filter through and is hand-washable. This cream panel is ideal for kitchens as it's flame-retardant. 
 Panel blinds are great for covering large spans of glass or as window dividers due to their large widths and drops. One of the largest blinds we products at 5 metres width and over 3 metres drop, panel blinds are a modern take on traditional vertical blinds, and are just as stylish when up. 
 At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new voile panel blind is made by their expert team in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with customer-1st service! 
 
 Product id: db-pan0335 fabric colour: sandshell cream material: 100% polyester headrail: white aluminium   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes

products.title: Chatsworth Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Chatsworth cream panel blind in cream. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A modern patterned translucent fabric in 3 colour ways. You will also find this design in their vertical and roller blind collections. 
 
This bold cream and white patterned panel blind will look great in any room and can also be used as a divider.
 
 Product id: db-pan0089 fabric colour: cream headrail: white aluminium   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout cream panel blind in cream. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, soft and warm, their bella blackout cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. 
 
Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their panel blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their panel blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.
 
 Product id: db-pan0250 fabric colour: cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella blackout dove grey panel blind in grey. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This dove grey panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3.5 metres drop! 
 
 At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This grey panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. 
 
 Product id: db-pan0265 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Eco Friendly FR Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Eco friendly fr cream panel blind. Made to measure from 42.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This panel blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! 
 
Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen. Cream panel blinds are a fantastic way to add warm back into your room, whilst still staying in the neutral colour palette. Panel blinds are fantastic as room dividers or for large panes of glass due to their large size, up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do their hand-made panel blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind!
 
 Product id: db-pan0302 fabric colour: cream material: 100% recycled polyester lining: white aluminium 5 channel track   control type: cord or wand energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Oyster
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure splash oyster standard panel blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality standard panel blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm
 	min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm
 	composition: polyester
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	stack: a choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets.
